title: Elder Souls
description: Elder Souls is an attempt to bring some Soulsborne flavor to Skyrim. You should expect challenging but fair combat, an awesome dark fantasy vibe and a plethora of new content. Among this new content you will find a variety of new hand placed monster types, atleast four player houses per hold and many new dungeons and quests. Leveling and death are modelled after the Dark Souls system but utilizing gold rather than souls. Sleep to raise skills and level up.
author: jdsmith2816

title: Nice Overall Improvement SE
description: NOISE is a Modlist with enhanced graphics, mechanics, and immersion, while staying true to the original vision of Skyrim mechanics; basically, Skyrim++.
author: DoubleDog(Shelb) maintained by Helidoc65 and johanlh

title: Lexy's LOTD Unofficial
description: Lexy's Legacy of the Dragonborn is a massive overhaul of Skyrim with Legacy of the Dragonborn being the core mod that it is built around. Lexy's LOTD was created by DarkLadyLexy and her guide is located here: https://wiki.nexusmods.com/index.php/User:Darkladylexy/Lexys_LOTD_SE
author: Mdc211

title: Living Skyrim
description: Living Skyrim is a full-featured overhaul of Skyrim SE with the intent to breathe life into the often empty areas of the world. NPCs, quests, new worldspaces, and interactive content are the focus of the modlist. All of this on top of a beautiful graphics package intended for higher-end PCs.
author: ForgottenGlory

title: Dungeons & Deviousness
description: Dungeons & Deviousness is a NSFW Skyrim SE modlist intended to be fully playable with a semi-hardcore survival experience included. Rather than a screenshot simulator or lightweight add-on to vanilla Skyrim, Dungeons & Deviousness seeks to be as intrusive as possible in the systems present in Skyrim and overhaul them to fit the theme.
author: ForgottenGlory

title: Viva New Vegas
description: An unofficial modlist that is slightly modified from the original vanilla+ viva new vegas guide created by Qolore7.
author: LadyZeefa
